title: Add trailing newline to playground input (suppress annoying error message)
body:
Before filing a bug, please check whether it has been fixed since
the latest release: run "hg pull -u" and retry what you did to
reproduce the problem.  Thanks.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
run this program in the Go playground:
package main

import (
"fmt"
"time"
)

func main() {
	fmt.Println(time.LocalTime())

}


What is the expected output?

current time


What do you see instead?

Tue Nov 10 23:00:00 UTC 2009

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

Go Playground (presumably 2009-09-16 release)


Which operating system are you using?


Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)


Please provide any additional information below.
Attachments: 1. Screen shot 2010-09-16 at 6.52.28 AM.png (28558 bytes)
